releaseNotes:
- Small Widget (2×2):
Unlock your door instantly from your home screen with our new compact widget!
More sizes are on the way — stay tuned.

- CarPlay Widget:
Access your door right from your car’s dashboard — completely hands-free and seamless!
Note: CarPlay widget requires iOS 26.0 or later.

- Bug Fixes and Improvements:
General enhancements and adjustments for an even better experience.

Update now and enjoy a smarter, simpler everyday life with Defigo!
description:
Defigo v2 is the Defigo user’s primary tool. Working in conjunction with the Defigo Intercom and Smart Readers, Defigo v2 turns the Defigo user’s smartphone into their door key and answering device for unmatched everyday convenience.  

Quick Overview 

The Defigo v2 app is built for convenient property access and secure visitor management. 

Defigo users can use Defigo v2 to access their property with just the tap of a button, eliminating the need to carry physical keys. 

When a visitor rings a user’s doorbell on the Defigo intercom, the user  receives a video call where they can see and speak to the visitor before granting them access to the property. 

Receiving a call

Defigo v2 makes visitor management simple.  
When a visitor rings the user’s doorbell button on the Defigo intercom, the user receives a call directly to their phone. The call screen states which door the call is coming from, as well as two buttons - one that lets the user decline the call and one that lets them answer the call. 

If the user chooses to answer the call, they will  see a live video stream of the visitor. The user can then speak to the visitor through the phone and choose whether they want to end the call or open the door to the visitor. 

The user can receive calls from visitors as well as grant access wherever they are in the world as long as they have an internet connection. 

Favorites 

Favorites is new with Defigo v2 and allows Defigo users to add their frequently used doors to the front page of their app for quick and easy access. 

Users can add doors to their Favorites directly from the Favorites screen, or from the Doors page by marking their frequently used door with a star.  

Once the door has been marked as a Favorite, the home screen of Defigo v2 will show the Favorite doors above other doors to which the user has access. 


Personalization

Defigo v2 allows Defigo users to personalize their doorbell buttons (displayed on the Defigo Intercom).  
Depending on their level of administration access, Defigo users will either be able to edit their whole unit’s doorbell button, or just their own personal doorbell button. 

Defigo users can personalize their name, photo and/or logo. 

If the user does not want to be disturbed, or are on vacation, they can choose to hide their doorbell button. 

If the Defigo user has a doorbell button for their unit, they can choose between 3 options for the visitor call preference: 


Grouped: When visitors press the group button, they will get the individual names of all the users registered in the unit. 
Sequential: Users registered in the unit will be called in priority order of the Defigo user’s choice. The Defigo user can choose how long it will take before the call goes to the next user. 
Parallel: All users registered in the unit will be called at the same time. When one user accepts the call it will stop calling other users.  


Keyfobs and Access Cards 

Adding a keyfob or access card can be done using the Defigo v2 mobile app. 
The user needs to be next to a Defigo Intercom or Smart Reader that they have access to when registering the keyfob or access card. 

If the Defigo user selects the door they are next to while on the ‘Access Cards’ screen, they will be guided through the process of adding a keyfob or access card. 

Defigo v2 can also be used to deactivate a keyfob or access card, set up a PIN code for the keyfob or access card, and delete a PIN code. 

All of these can be administered from the Access Cards screen. 

—

Defigo v2 is simple to use and makes the user’s everyday life easier and more convenient. 
For any questions, reach out to support@getdefigo.com
